## Import

# format is database name | schema name | external function name | <list of function arg types, separated with '-'>

```sh
 $ pulumi import snowflake:index/externalFunction:ExternalFunction example 'dbName|schemaName|externalFunctionName|varchar-varchar-varchar'
```


{{% examples %}}

## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}





{{< example csharp >}}

```csharp
using Pulumi;
using Snowflake = Pulumi.Snowflake;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var testExtFunc = new Snowflake.ExternalFunction("testExtFunc", new Snowflake.ExternalFunctionArgs
        {
            ApiIntegration = "api_integration_name",
            Args = 
            {
                new Snowflake.Inputs.ExternalFunctionArgArgs
                {
                    Name = "arg1",
                    Type = "varchar",
                },
                new Snowflake.Inputs.ExternalFunctionArgArgs
                {
                    Name = "arg2",
                    Type = "varchar",
                },
            },
            Database = "my_test_db",
            ReturnBehavior = "IMMUTABLE",
            ReturnType = "varchar",
            Schema = "my_test_schema",
            UrlOfProxyAndResource = "https://123456.execute-api.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/prod/test_func",
        });
    }

}
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example go >}}

```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-snowflake/sdk/go/snowflake"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := snowflake.NewExternalFunction(ctx, "testExtFunc", &snowflake.ExternalFunctionArgs{
			ApiIntegration: pulumi.String("api_integration_name"),
			Args: ExternalFunctionArgArray{
				&ExternalFunctionArgArgs{
					Name: pulumi.String("arg1"),
					Type: pulumi.String("varchar"),
				},
				&ExternalFunctionArgArgs{
					Name: pulumi.String("arg2"),
					Type: pulumi.String("varchar"),
				},
			},
			Database:              pulumi.String("my_test_db"),
			ReturnBehavior:        pulumi.String("IMMUTABLE"),
			ReturnType:            pulumi.String("varchar"),
			Schema:                pulumi.String("my_test_schema"),
			UrlOfProxyAndResource: pulumi.String("https://123456.execute-api.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/prod/test_func"),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example python >}}

```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_snowflake as snowflake

test_ext_func = snowflake.ExternalFunction("testExtFunc",
    api_integration="api_integration_name",
    args=[
        snowflake.ExternalFunctionArgArgs(
            name="arg1",
            type="varchar",
        ),
        snowflake.ExternalFunctionArgArgs(
            name="arg2",
            type="varchar",
        ),
    ],
    database="my_test_db",
    return_behavior="IMMUTABLE",
    return_type="varchar",
    schema="my_test_schema",
    url_of_proxy_and_resource="https://123456.execute-api.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/prod/test_func")
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example typescript >}}


```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as snowflake from "@pulumi/snowflake";

const testExtFunc = new snowflake.ExternalFunction("test_ext_func", {
    apiIntegration: "api_integration_name",
    args: [
        {
            name: "arg1",
            type: "varchar",
        },
        {
            name: "arg2",
            type: "varchar",
        },
    ],
    database: "my_test_db",
    returnBehavior: "IMMUTABLE",
    returnType: "varchar",
    schema: "my_test_schema",
    urlOfProxyAndResource: "https://123456.execute-api.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/prod/test_func",
});
```

The ExternalFunction resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs" >}}) properties:

    <dd>{{% md %}}If specified, the JSON payload is compressed when sent from Snowflake to the proxy service, and when sent back from the proxy service to Snowflake.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="contextheaders_go">
<a href="#contextheaders_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Context<wbr>Headers</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">[]string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Binds Snowflake context function results to HTTP headers.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="headers_go">
<a href="#headers_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Headers</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#externalfunctionheader">[]External<wbr>Function<wbr>Header<wbr>Args</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Allows users to specify key-value metadata that is sent with every request as HTTP headers.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="maxbatchrows_go">
<a href="#maxbatchrows_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Max<wbr>Batch<wbr>Rows</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}This specifies the maximum number of rows in each batch sent to the proxy service.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="name_go">
<a href="#name_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Specifies the identifier for the external function. The identifier can contain the schema name and database name, as well as the function name. The function's signature (name and argument data types) must be unique within the schema.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="nullinputbehavior_go">
<a href="#nullinputbehavior_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Null<wbr>Input<wbr>Behavior</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Specifies the behavior of the external function when called with null inputs.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="returnnullallowed_go">
<a href="#returnnullallowed_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Return<wbr>Null<wbr>Allowed</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Indicates whether the function can return NULL values or must return only NON-NULL values.
{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

## Look up an Existing ExternalFunction Resource {#look-up}

Get an existing ExternalFunction resource's state with the given name, ID, and optional extra properties used to qualify the lookup.
{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}

{{% choosable language nodejs %}}
<div class="highlight"><pre class="chroma"><code class="language-typescript" data-lang="typescript"><span class="k">public static </span><span class="nf">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">name</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">string</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">id</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx"><a href="/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#ID">Input&lt;ID&gt;</a></span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">state</span><span class="p">?:</span> <span class="nx">ExternalFunctionState</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">opts</span><span class="p">?:</span> <span class="nx"><a href="/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#CustomResourceOptions">CustomResourceOptions</a></span><span class="p">): </span><span class="nx">ExternalFunction</span></code></pre></div>
{{% /choosable %}}

{{% choosable language python %}}
<div class="highlight"><pre class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class=nd>@staticmethod</span>
<span class="k">def </span><span class="nf">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">resource_name</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">str</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">id</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">str</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">opts</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx"><a href="/docs/reference/pkg/python/pulumi/#pulumi.ResourceOptions">Optional[ResourceOptions]</a></span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">api_integration</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">args</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[Sequence[ExternalFunctionArgArgs]]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">comment</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">compression</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">context_headers</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[Sequence[str]]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">created_on</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">database</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">headers</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[Sequence[ExternalFunctionHeaderArgs]]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">max_batch_rows</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[int]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">name</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">null_input_behavior</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">return_behavior</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">return_null_allowed</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[bool]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">return_type</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">schema</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">url_of_proxy_and_resource</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">) -&gt;</span> ExternalFunction</code></pre></div>
{{% /choosable %}}

{{% choosable language go %}}

The following state arguments are supported:


{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_apiintegration_csharp">
<a href="#state_apiintegration_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Api<wbr>Integration</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The name of the API integration object that should be used to authenticate the call to the proxy service.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_args_csharp">
<a href="#state_args_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Args</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#externalfunctionarg">List&lt;External<wbr>Function<wbr>Arg<wbr>Args&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Specifies the arguments/inputs for the external function. These should correspond to the arguments that the remote service expects.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_comment_csharp">
<a href="#state_comment_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Comment</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}A description of the external function.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_compression_csharp">
<a href="#state_compression_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Compression</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}If specified, the JSON payload is compressed when sent from Snowflake to the proxy service, and when sent back from the proxy service to Snowflake.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_contextheaders_csharp">
<a href="#state_contextheaders_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Context<wbr>Headers</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Binds Snowflake context function results to HTTP headers.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_createdon_csharp">
<a href="#state_createdon_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Created<wbr>On</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Date and time when the external function was created.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_database_csharp">
<a href="#state_database_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Database</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The database in which to create the external function.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_headers_csharp">
<a href="#state_headers_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Headers</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#externalfunctionheader">List&lt;External<wbr>Function<wbr>Header<wbr>Args&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Allows users to specify key-value metadata that is sent with every request as HTTP headers.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_maxbatchrows_csharp">
<a href="#state_maxbatchrows_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Max<wbr>Batch<wbr>Rows</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}This specifies the maximum number of rows in each batch sent to the proxy service.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_name_csharp">
<a href="#state_name_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Specifies the identifier for the external function. The identifier can contain the schema name and database name, as well as the function name. The function's signature (name and argument data types) must be unique within the schema.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_nullinputbehavior_csharp">
<a href="#state_nullinputbehavior_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Null<wbr>Input<wbr>Behavior</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Specifies the behavior of the external function when called with null inputs.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_returnbehavior_csharp">
<a href="#state_returnbehavior_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Return<wbr>Behavior</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Specifies the behavior of the function when returning results
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_returnnullallowed_csharp">
<a href="#state_returnnullallowed_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Return<wbr>Null<wbr>Allowed</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Indicates whether the function can return NULL values or must return only NON-NULL values.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_returntype_csharp">
<a href="#state_returntype_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Return<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Specifies the data type returned by the external function.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_schema_csharp">
<a href="#state_schema_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Schema</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The schema in which to create the external function.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_urlofproxyandresource_csharp">
<a href="#state_urlofproxyandresource_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Url<wbr>Of<wbr>Proxy<wbr>And<wbr>Resource</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}This is the invocation URL of the proxy service and resource through which Snowflake calls the remote service.
{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_returnnullallowed_nodejs">
<a href="#state_returnnullallowed_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">return<wbr>Null<wbr>Allowed</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">boolean</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Indicates whether the function can return NULL values or must return only NON-NULL values.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_returntype_nodejs">
<a href="#state_returntype_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">return<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Specifies the data type returned by the external function.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_schema_nodejs">
<a href="#state_schema_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">schema</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The schema in which to create the external function.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_urlofproxyandresource_nodejs">
<a href="#state_urlofproxyandresource_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">url<wbr>Of<wbr>Proxy<wbr>And<wbr>Resource</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}This is the invocation URL of the proxy service and resource through which Snowflake calls the remote service.
{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

{{% choosable language python %}}
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_api_integration_python">

            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_args_python">
<a href="#state_args_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">args</a>
</span>

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Specifies the arguments/inputs for the external function. These should correspond to the arguments that the remote service expects.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_comment_python">
<a href="#state_comment_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">comment</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}A description of the external function.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_compression_python">
<a href="#state_compression_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">compression</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}If specified, the JSON payload is compressed when sent from Snowflake to the proxy service, and when sent back from the proxy service to Snowflake.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_context_headers_python">

        <span class="property-type">Sequence[str]</span>
    </dt>

{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_created_on_python">
<a href="#state_created_on_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">created_<wbr>on</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>

            title="Optional">

</span>

    </dt>

{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>

{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Specifies the identifier for the external function. The identifier can contain the schema name and database name, as well as the function name. The function's signature (name and argument data types) must be unique within the schema.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_null_input_behavior_python">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Specifies the behavior of the external function when called with null inputs.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
